name: The non ideal Laputa
description:
In order to escape the pressure of reality, the protagonist goes to they utopia - Sky City, but finds that maybe this place is not as ideal as they thought. So how is they going to cope with?

Dedicate this work to my lost self, and people who are also caught in the absurdity in this pandemic era when their ideals are difficult to achieve.

Use ←, →, ↓ and space to control the character (the character can only walk down but not up), and press F to have a dialogue with the NPCs / events / objects.

(Except for the characters, the scene assets and cover of this game are made of multiple pictures produced by the midjourney algorithm after collaging and photoshop modification by myself.)
